## Collections.Utils.KeyValueValidators.validateValue() method

Validates a supplied unknown as a valid value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validateValue(key: unknown): DetailedResult<TV, ResultMapResultDetail>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

The unknown to be validated.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TV, [ResultMapResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the validated value and 'success' detail if the value is valid, or `Failure` with an error message and 'invalid-value' detail if the value is invalid.
